protocol.text: The data were analyzed with LIMMA package of Bioconductor using GCRMA normalization procedure. ID_REF =  VALUE = GCRMA-normalized log2 expression signal
Plants were treated at 4ﾰC under a 12 hr photoperiod for 24 h
Plants were grown in soil at 22ﾰC under a 12 hr photoperiod for 3 weeks
RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen)
RNA was amplified and biotinylated using a MessageAmp kit (Ambion) according to the manufacturer's protocol
Hybridization and washing were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)
Scan protocols were carried out according to the Gene Chip manufacturer's protocol (Affymetrix)
